name: Deploy Hugo site to Pages

# 监听 main 分支的推送
on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  build-and-deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      # 1. 检出仓库代码
      - name: Checkout repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      # 2. 安装 Hugo extended
      - name: Setup Hugo
        uses: peaceiris/actions-hugo@v2
        with:
          hugo-version: '0.147.6'   # 与你本地一致
          extended: true

      # 3. 构建站点
      - name: Build site
        run: hugo --minify

      # 4. 部署到 GitHub Pages
      - name: Deploy to GitHub Pages
        uses: peaceiris/actions-gh-pages@v4
        with:
          github_token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
          publish_dir: ./public
          cname: haojiegroup.com     # 自定义域名
          force_orphan: true
